name: Space Jam (itch) (chrislg)
description:
Fight for Corporate Domination High Above Planet Florida, in a game that was made in under 48hrs by a team of over-caffeinated space misfits and teenagers.

Each player in this four player game represents a company aiming to monopolize space. From your corporate orbital platform, launch more satellites than the other companies and establish dominance! 

Be careful, though - satellites can collide! Debris and satellites impacting Planet Florida will eventually destroy the planet, ending the game. Have the most satellites flying when the world explodes to win!

Game is played using a controller, use the left stick to aim your satellite slingshot, and press and hold A to adjust launch power. 

This game is inspired by the real-life traffic jam in space, where satellites and debris are in danger of colliding every day.  Space debris is a real issue as space becomes more commercialized, this is our little attempt to have some fun and call attention at the same time. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Space_debris

Contributors include:

Emilio Alban - Unity Programming

Joe Peaden - Unity Programming

Mike Bianchini - Unity Programming and art

Elizabeth Duffy - 2D Art

Chris Duffy - Rocket Science and Play Testing

Brian Luft - Incredible Audio
